title: Video: Hartheim – Welcome To Hartheim
content:
Hartheim – Welcome To Hartheim from Hartheim on Vimeo.

I first wrote about Hartheim, the Manchester based foreboding rock outfit a few weeks back and was intrigued by their angst filled musical world. They have now released visuals to accompany their brutally vulnerable  single Welcome To Hartheim. The video features the juxtaposition of beautiful and elegant choreography against the ominous aesthetic portrayed by the track. It’s a dark and disturbing affair, but one that is wholly captivating and enthralling. I said it before and I’ll say it again; What a bloody powerful outro.

Check out the Jack Bottomley directed visuals above.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d46
